td.content: s:a male aged 38 years complains of recurrent Kidney over the past month. Alcohol 1-4 beers/month Patient does not smoke o:Height 68 in, Weight 156 lbs, Temperature 98.2 F, Pulse 85, SystolicBP 109, DiastolicBP 71, Respiration 17 a:Acute Renal Failure p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and referred patient to nephrology.

s:a M aged 38 Ys presents with chronic Kidney. s:patient presents with Kidney for more than 8 days. patient is a 39 yr old white M fire fighter.
